channel.title: Data Science on Data Science, et al.
channel.description: Recent content in Data Science on Data Science, et al.

item.title: What makes some blink-182 songs more popular than others? Part 1
item.description: Justification (Background) For Christmas one year while I was in elementary school, my next-door neighbor got a GameCube from Santa Claus, and he gave me his old Nintendo 64 along with all his games. I was in heaven. I would play Tony Hawk Pro Skater 3 for hours and hours (until I got a C+ in my 6th grade English class and my mom took it away). I didn’t have a memory card, so I had to leave the game running overnight for several days in order to make it to the later levels of the game.

item.title: Summer Goals, starting a blog in an hour a day, and Iris
item.description: Being in school is great—at the end of each semester, I feel like I can restart my life and make New Year’s Resolutions. My big resolution now that winter semester is over is to develop a data science portfolio in the form of a blog. I can’t dedicate my whole summer to blogging, but I am pretty confident that I can carve out an hour of time every day to spend on this.
